abstract: Three new services from Google, Yahoo and Teleflip can forward e-mail to ordinary cellphones.
snippet: Three new services from Google, Yahoo and Teleflip can forward e-mail to ordinary cellphones.
lead_paragraph: When you whip out a BlackBerry or a Treo in public, what does it say about you?

headline.main: How to Make Your Cellphone Act Like a BlackBerry

abstract: Google is closing in on an agreement to acquire Feedburner, a provider of Web content syndication tools, for about $100 million in cash, according to TechCrunch, which cited an unnamed source close to the deal. The technology blog, which first broke the news that Google would buy YouTube, said the Feedburner deal is expected to close in two to three weeks, and that “there is nothing that can really derail it at this point.” Feedburner, founded in 2003, has raised $10 million in venture capital from Portage Ventures, Mobius Venture Capital and Union Square Ventures.
lead_paragraph: Google is closing in on an agreement to acquire Feedburner, a provider of Web content syndication tools, for about $100 million in cash, according to TechCrunch, which cited an unnamed source close to the deal. The technology blog, which first broke the news that Google would buy YouTube, said the Feedburner deal is expected to close in two to three weeks, and that “there is nothing that can really derail it at this point.” Feedburner, founded in 2003, has raised $10 million in venture capital from Portage Ventures, Mobius Venture Capital and Union Square Ventures.

headline.main: Google Close to Buying Feedburner, Report  Says
